about_the_game:
The C195 Businessliner is a light aircraft powered by a single radial engine. Manufactured between 1947 and 1954, 1,180 aircraft were built for private customers as well as for the US Air Force and Army. The C195 was the first aircraft manufactured by Cessna to be made entirely from aluminium and is larger than most Cessnas due to the space required by the radial engine. Due to the high running costs of the aircraft, Cessna marketed the aircraft for use by businesses, giving it the title 'Businessliner'.

  • High-definition textures
  • Superb material shines and reflections
  • Volumetric side view prop effect
  • Gauge reflections
  • Windows scratches and propeller blade shines
  • High quality 3D model and textures
  • Blank texture for creating your own liveries
  • Realistic flying behaviour
  • With/without fairings option
detailed_description:
The C195 Businessliner is a light aircraft powered by a single radial engine. Manufactured between 1947 and 1954, 1,180 aircraft were built for private customers as well as for the US Air Force and Army. The C195 was the first aircraft manufactured by Cessna to be made entirely from aluminium and is larger than most Cessnas due to the space required by the radial engine. Due to the high running costs of the aircraft, Cessna marketed the aircraft for use by businesses, giving it the title 'Businessliner'.

  • High-definition textures
  • Superb material shines and reflections
  • Volumetric side view prop effect
  • Gauge reflections
  • Windows scratches and propeller blade shines
  • High quality 3D model and textures
  • Blank texture for creating your own liveries

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

short_description: The C195 Businessliner is a light aircraft powered by a single radial engine. Manufactured between 1947 and 1954, 1,180 aircraft were built for private customers as well as for the US Air Force and Army.
